description: Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of one Tuba for the Royal Canadian Artillery Band of the Canadian Armed Forces in Edmonton, with a preference for Canadian goods.
full_summary:
=====================================================

# Tender Announcement: W0127-22P021

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites vendors to submit bids for the supply and delivery of one tuba for the Royal Canadian Artillery Band of the Canadian Armed Forces located in Edmonton.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Number:** W0127-22P021
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3632343002
* **Publication Date:** December 9, 2022
* **Proposal Closing Date:** January 5, 2023, at 14:00 HNE
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 11, 2022 (expired)
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023 (expired)

## Tender Information

* **Tender Classification:** Musical Instruments and parts and accessories (UNSPSC 60130000)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Procedure type: Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta, Edmonton

## Submitting Proposals

All required supporting documentation and the bid submission must be submitted by January 5, 2023, at 14:00 HNE. Late bids will not be considered and will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

Tel: None, Fax: None
Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Attachment:** None

## Notice URL

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14857975?extsite=MTQ4NTc5NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
